document_info.title: Enhanced Document Search and User Management Features

executive_summary: This BRD outlines requirements for enhancing paperless-ngx with improved document search capabilities, user authentication improvements, and API endpoint enhancements. The goal is to improve user experience and enable better integration with external systems.

business_objectives.objective: Improve document search functionality with advanced filtering
Expand API capabilities for document management

functional.description: User authentication and authorization system supporting OAuth2 and API keys
Advanced document search with full-text search and metadata filtering
RESTful API endpoints for document CRUD operations
Configuration management system for system settings
User management and role-based access control
